name: The Frozen Depths
description:
Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 48 Compo Game Jam

You’ve crash landed in the mouth of a frigid underwater cave network on Europa, the moon of Jupiter. Your only hope of escape is to retrieve the missing parts of your ship from the dark, winding, and dangerous tunnels below.

Explore procedurally generated caves, manage oxygen levels, upgrade your suit, avoid hazards and enemies, track down the parts of your ship, and escape from Europa.
